std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Jacobus Johannes Poulus Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 17, entry number 191. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 22
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with Jacobus Johannes Poulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Jacobus Johannes Poulus Smit baptism on 21 Apr 1793, son of Jacobus Smit & Jacoba Elisabet Meyntjies van den Berg.

std_narrative.citation:
Jacobus, son of Jacobus Smit & Jacoba Elisabet Meyntjies van den Berg, was baptised on 21 April 1793. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Jacobus Johannes Poulus Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 17, entry number 191. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 22
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with Jacobus Johannes Poulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Jacobus Johannes Poulus Smit baptism on 21 Apr 1793, son of Jacobus Smit & Jacoba Elisabet Meyntjies van den Berg.
